testcase.name: Create Order Saucedemo - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Buyer landing to saucedemo............................................passed Given Buyer login to the saucedemo username standard_user and password secret_sauce.passed When Buyer add a saucedemo product Sauce Labs Backpack and Sauce Labs Bike Light to the cart.passed And Buyer checkout saucedemo product Sauce Labs Backpack and Sauce Labs Bike Light.passed And Buyer insert Jhon Wick 12345 for shipping...............................passed And Buyer will see checkout overview Sauce Labs Backpack....................passed Then Buyer will see message confirmation page Thank you for your order!.....passed
